name: CAAnimation
desc: The abstract superclass for animations in Core Animation.

items.name: var isRemovedOnCompletion: Bool
items.desc: Determines if the animation is removed from the target layer’s animations upon completion.

items.name: var timingFunction: CAMediaTimingFunction?
items.desc: An optional timing function defining the pacing of the animation.

items.name: class func defaultValue(forKey: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Specifies the default value of the property with the specified key.

items.name: func shouldArchiveValue(forKey: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Specifies whether the value of the property for a given key is archived.

items.name: var usesSceneTimeBase: Bool
items.desc: For animations attached to SceneKit objects, a Boolean value that determines whether the animation is evaluated using the scene time or the system time.

items.name: var fadeInDuration: CGFloat
items.desc: For animations attached to SceneKit objects, the duration for transitioning into the animation’s effect as it begins.

items.name: var fadeOutDuration: CGFloat
items.desc: For animations attached to SceneKit objects, the duration for transitioning out of the animation’s effect as it ends.

items.name: var animationEvents: [SCNAnimationEvent]?
items.desc: For animations attached to SceneKit objects, a list of events attached to an animation.

items.name: init(scnAnimation: SCNAnimation)
items.desc: Creates an animation from a SceneKit animation.
